titles.title: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2010
To expand the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the SUNY National Center for Security and Preparedness.
National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2010

bill.summary: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Enhancement Act of 2010 - Requires the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the SUNY (State University of New York) National Center for Security and Preparedness in order to train state, local, and tribal emergency response providers to prepare for and respond to acts of terrorism.
